title: Junior Graphic Designer
job_overview:
We're looking for a creative, detail-oriented Junior Graphic Designer to support our design and content team. If you’ve got a great eye for design, love working in Canva, and know your way around basic video editing tools like CapCut or VEED, we want to hear from you.

What You’ll Do:
Design social media graphics, ads, and basic marketing materials using Canva
Edit short-form videos for platforms like Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts
Collaborate with our team to create engaging, on-brand content
Assist with occasional layout or visual content updates
Maintain consistency in visual style across platforms

Requirements:
Proficient in Canva (templates, animations, brand kits, etc.)
Basic video editing experience with tools like CapCut, VEED, or similar
Strong eye for layout, color, and typography
Able to follow brand guidelines and adapt to different styles
Reliable, responsive, and able to meet deadlines

Nice to Have:
Experience with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Premiere Pro
Understanding of social media trends and content styles
Interest in marketing or advertising

To Apply: Send your portfolio or 3–5 examples of relevant work
